title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4004.3 - Transmission equipment to be reported
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4004.3 - Transmission equipment to be reported

State Regulations

Each licensed or franchised racing association shall, upon request from the commission, furnish the commission with a written
description or blueprint, as requested by the commission, showing the location
of all equipment used or permitted to be used for the transmission of
information within, to or from the premises, together with all telephone, teletype and telegraph or other electrical wires and radio and television
equipment upon or entering the premises of such association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4004.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
